Klahanie Volunteers

[/fusion_text][fusion_text columns=”” column_min_width=”” column_spacing=”” rule_style=”default” rule_size=”” rule_color=”” hide_on_mobile=”small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility” class=”” id=”” animation_type=”” animation_direction=”left” animation_speed=”0.3” animation_offset=””]

The information below is provided to help you discover the joys and benefits of being a volunteer at Klahanie, and to inform you of all the wonderful ways that you can participate - both in Committees and Events. Find just the right area to volunteer and reap the rewards as a result.

EVENTS

[/fusion_text][fusion_imageframe image_id=”3959|full” max_width=”” style_type=”” blur=”” stylecolor=”” hover_type=”none” bordersize=”” bordercolor=”” borderradius=”” align=”center” lightbox=”no” gallery_id=”” lightbox_image=”” lightbox_image_id=”” alt=”” link=”https://yourvolunteers.com/vol?rz4teoaqi65vdk3j1uj7kamhwygsy” linktarget=”_self” hide_on_mobile=”small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility” class=”” id=”” animation_type=”” animation_direction=”left” animation_speed=”0.3” animation_offset=”” filter_hue=”0” filter_saturation=”100” filter_brightness=”100” filter_contrast=”100” filter_invert=”0” filter_sepia=”0” filter_opacity=”100” filter_blur=”0” filter_hue_hover=”0” filter_saturation_hover=”100” filter_brightness_hover=”100” filter_contrast_hover=”100” filter_invert_hover=”0” filter_sepia_hover=”0” filter_opacity_hover=”100” filter_blur_hover=”0”]http://klahanie.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/VOLUNTEER-e1581936387567.png[/fusion_imageframe][fusion_separator style_type=”none” hide_on_mobile=”small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility” class=”” id=”” sep_color=”” top_margin=”20” bottom_margin=”” border_size=”” icon=”” icon_size=”” icon_circle=”” icon_circle_color=”” width=”” alignment=”center” /][fusion_text columns=”” column_min_width=”” column_spacing=”” rule_style=”default” rule_size=”” rule_color=”” hide_on_mobile=”small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility” class=”” id=”” animation_type=”” animation_direction=”left” animation_speed=”0.3” animation_offset=””]

We all know Klahanie is a great place to live.  Part of the reason is because of all the fun community events your HOA assessments help fund.  Events are growing every year, and we want to do more of them!  However, we cannot sustain and grow these events without volunteers.  Below are 5 reasons to volunteer.

[/fusion_text][fusion_separator style_type=”none” hide_on_mobile=”small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility” class=”” id=”” sep_color=”” top_margin=”15” bottom_margin=”” border_size=”” icon=”” icon_size=”” icon_circle=”” icon_circle_color=”” width=”” alignment=”center” /][fusion_text columns=”” column_min_width=”” column_spacing=”” rule_style=”default” rule_size=”” rule_color=”” hide_on_mobile=”small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility” class=”” id=”” animation_type=”” animation_direction=”left” animation_speed=”0.3” animation_offset=””]

Why Volunteer?

#5: Volunteering strengthens your community.

As a volunteer you help:

  • Support families and youth

  • Energize the community

#4: You learn a lot.

Volunteers learn things like these:

  • Volunteers can gain professional experience.

  • Self: Volunteers discover hidden talents that may change your view on your self-worth.

  • Community: Volunteers gain knowledge of local resources available to solve community needs.

#3: You can earn hours for school and club community service requirements

#2: Volunteering encourages civic responsibility.

Community service and volunteerism are an investment in our community and the people who live in it.

#1: You make a difference - Every person counts!

If you are interested in becoming a Klahanie volunteer, CLICK HERE to sign up in our volunteer database.  You do NOT have to be a Klahanie resident to volunteer in the Klahanie community. If you have additional questions about being an event volunteer, email events@klahanie.com
